pullRequest.title: Update serverModel to use 'headless' check consistently
pullRequest.bodyText:
Instead of using either the headless instance being null,
or the 'ui' being null to check for headless, this update
changes ServerMode to use HeadlessServer.headless() instead.

Testing

Screens Shots

Additional Notes to Reviewer

Release Note

commit.message:
Update serverModel to use 'headless' check consistently

Instead of using either the headless instance being null,
or the 'ui' being null to check for headless, this update
changes ServerMode to use HeadlessServer.headless() instead.

nodes.bodyText:
A bit late to the party, but I want to provide some context to this.
IIRC I introduced the ui != null check consistently as a first step to abstract the UI into an interace eventually, so that disablePlayer for example would just call an interface, which does nothing for headless servers, but does all of the UI stuff for headed servers.
